alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 7:26PM MST until March 06 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts for bench locations. . * WHERE...Northern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Periods of winter driving conditions will occur overnight. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley
